primary_axis.name: STABILITY_GRADIENT
primary_axis.interpretation: The system performs oscillatory fixation along the STABILITY_GRADIENT

STATE-C.description: mandatory central waypoint for all transformations

forbidden_transition_meaning.interpretation: A↔B is forbidden because these states represent incompatible processing modes; transformation must pass through STATE-C (processing hub) to convert between them

objective_function.name: MINIMIZE_STABILITY
objective_function.mechanism: System decreases stability level through iterative processing until STATE-C optimum reached

FUNCTIONAL_CHARACTERIZATION: The Voynich semantic state machine operates along a STABILITY_GRADIENT, minimizing stability level. STATE-C serves as PROCESSING_HUB (mandatory central waypoint for all transformations). The forbidden A↔B transition enforces oscillatory fixation discipline. System resilience is HIGH.
